generated.css: *,:after,:before{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:inherit}html{font-size:62.5%;box-sizing:border-box}.container{padding:2rem;max-width:140rem;margin:auto}.body,.btn{color:#fff;font-family:Inter,sans-serif}.btn{font-size:1.6rem;padding:2rem;background:rgba(80,129,251,.08);border-radius:.8rem;border:4px solid transparent;transition:all .2s ease}.btn-dark:hover{background:rgba(80,129,251,.16);cursor:pointer}.btn-dark:active{border:4px solid rgba(80,129,251,.24)}.btn-light{background-color:#5081fb;color:#051d3b;cursor:pointer}.btn-light:hover{background:#7ba4fc}.btn-light:active{border:4px solid rgba(80,129,251,.72)}.input{color:hsla(0,0%,100%,.64);font-size:1.6rem;font-family:Inter,sans-serif;height:5.6rem;width:100%;padding:1.5rem;background:hsla(0,0%,100%,.16);border-radius:8px;border:none;outline:none;transition:all .2s ease}.input::placeholder{color:hsla(0,0%,100%,.64)}.input:focus,.input:hover{background:hsla(0,0%,100%,.24)}.title{letter-spacing:.6rem}.header{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between}.header__logo,.header__user{width:20%}.header .logo{height:3.4rem;width:14.5rem}.header__form{margin:0 3rem;width:60%}.header .search{color:#fff;font-size:1.6rem;height:5.6rem;width:100%;padding:2rem;background:hsla(0,0%,100%,.16);border-radius:8px;border:none;outline:none;transition:all .2s ease}.header .search:focus,.header .search:hover{background:hsla(0,0%,100%,.24)}.header .user{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:flex-end;padding:1rem 2rem;margin-left:auto;max-width:14.5rem}.header .user-name{color:#fff;font-size:1.6rem;font-weight:lighter;margin-left:1rem}.header .user:hover{background:hsla(0,0%,100%,.08);border-radius:8px;cursor:pointer}.content{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;margin-top:5rem}.menu{display:flex;flex-direction:column;width:20%}.menu>:not(:last-child){margin-bottom:2rem}.menu__title{font-size:1.2rem;text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:lighter}.menu__item{display:flex;align-items:center}.menu__item-name{font-size:1.6rem;opacity:.56}.menu__item:hover{cursor:pointer}.menu__item:hover .menu__item-name{opacity:.8}.menu__item:hover .menu__icon{background:rgba(80,129,251,.64)}.menu__icon{background:#5081fb;border-radius:1.6rem;margin-right:1rem;padding:1.2rem;opacity:.16}.active>*{opacity:1}.editor{display:flex;flex-direction:column;margin:0 3rem;width:60%}.editor__container{background:#6bd1ff;border-radius:.8rem;margin-bottom:3rem;padding:3rem;position:relative}.editor__code{background-color:#000;border-top:4rem solid #000;border-radius:8px;color:#fff;font-size:1.4rem;font-family:Roboto mono,monospace;padding:0 2rem 2rem;resize:none;width:100%}.editor__code:focus{outline:none}.editor__code::-webkit-scrollbar{width:10px}.editor__code::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background:rgba(0,0,0,.9);border-radius:8px}.editor__code::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background:rgba(0,0,0,.2);border-radius:8px}.editor__code::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover{background:rgba(0,0,0,.1)}.editor__buttons{position:absolute;top:4.5rem;left:4.5rem}.editor__buttons:hover{cursor:pointer}.project{display:flex;flex-direction:column;width:20%}.project__info{margin-bottom:4rem}.project__info>:not(:last-child){margin-bottom:2rem}.project__info,.project__settings{display:flex;flex-direction:column}.project__info h3,.project__settings h3{font-size:1.2rem;font-weight:lighter;text-transform:uppercase}.project__select{background:hsla(0,0%,100%,.16);border:none;border-radius:8px;color:hsla(0,0%,100%,.64);font-size:1.6rem;font-family:Inter,sans-serif;height:5.6rem;outline:none;padding:1rem}.project__select:hover{background:hsla(0,0%,100%,.24)}.project__option{background-color:rgba(5,29,59,.8);border:none;border-radius:8px;color:#fff;outline:none;padding:1rem}.project__option:hover{background-color:#051d3b}.project__settings>:not(:last-child){margin-bottom:2.5rem}.project__description{height:100%;resize:none}.project__color-picker{background:transparent;border:1px solid #fff;border-radius:8px;height:5.6rem;padding:.3rem .4rem;width:100%}.project__color-picker::-webkit-color-swatch{border-radius:4px}.body{background-color:#051d3b}
